caption:
• 3DPW [56] is a multi-person dataset captured by a 
handheld camera, where most videos are collected 
from outdoor environments. As 3DHP, we also use the 
test set of 3DPW as a streaming target domain. 

Training details. We first train the base model M on the 
Human3.6M dataset and take 3DPW and 3DHP as test sets. 
All video frames are cropped and then scaled to 224 × 224 
pixels according to the bounding boxes calculated from 2D

Table 5. Ablation studies on the training schemes (#PS on 3DPW). 
B1-B3 update model parameters with constant forms of losses in 
a single optimization step. B4-B5 update model parameters with 
alternate loss functions. B6 and Final use bilevel optimization.
